text:
@senatemajldr You forgot the renovations to the FBI building, which is only a few blocks from Trump’s hotel. How does this help with coronavirus?  
It’s a skinny bill because you can’t gain consensus amongst your own party. Dems passed their bill months ago. Yours is a failure in leadership
